title: Chinese vs. American Rule Of Law

media:group.media:title: Chinese vs. American Rule Of Law
media:group.media:description:
An explanation of what it means to be 'above the law,' made by comparing rule of law (or lack of rule of law) in China and America.

If you want to support the channel, here are the best ways to do it:

1) Watch the full video
2) Subscribe if you haven't
3) Share with a friend
4) Support me with a small donation on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/rchapman 

0:00 Intro
1:10 What Is Rule Of Law?
03:25 Rule Of Law In America
13:35 Rule Of Law In China
18:52 Outro

Sources:

Rule Of Law - Tom Bingham
The Origins Of Political Order - Francis Fukuyama
Political Order And Political Decay - Francis Fukuyama
The United States Constitution
Constitution Of The People's Republic Of China
Rutledge Handbook Of The Chinese Communist Party - Edited by Willy Lam

Links:

https://www.americanbar.org/groups/public_education/resources/rule-of-law/
https://www.congress.gov/107/plaws/publ40/PLAW-107publ40.pdf
https://www.transparency.org/en/cpi/2020/index/nzl
https://www.supremecourt.gov/opinions/18pdf/18-422_9ol1.pdf

Intro/Outro Music: Double Soul - Unfinished Sympathy
